Member Function Documentation

const Real Ogre::PagingLandScapeData2DManager::getInterpolatedWorldHeight ( const Real  x,
const Real  z,
Real *  slope = NULL 
)

Get the real world height at a particular position.

Remarks:
Method is used to get the terrain height at a world position based on x and z. This method just figures out what page the position is on and then asks the page node to do the dirty work of getting the height.
the Real returned is the real world height based on the scale of the world. If the height could not be determined then -1 is returned and this would only occur if the page was not preloaded or loaded
Parameters:
x x world position
z z world position
